Desc.entry: Works with 5 secondary schools, 4 special schools and a large number of primary schools based in the south of Sheffield. Based on the site of Newfield School the centre works with the partner schools to enhance teaching and learning through the creative and innovative use of new technology. Offers a variety of courses, training and activities for both pupils, teachers and learning providers. Also runs an 'IT Club for the Community', a weekly drop-in session for the local community that provides IT facilities and offers informal advice on how to use email and the internet and provides opportunities to try new technologies such as the Nintendo Wii and the Apple iPad.
